SELECT A.ROUT_GRP ,B.ROUT_GRP_NM ,B.ROUT_ID ,B.ROUT_NM ,A.VHC_ID ,C.VHC_NO ,D.COMP_NM ,D.AREA ,(IF(B.USE_YN IS NULL, '', IF(B.USE_YN = 'Y', '노선사용', ''))) AS USE_YN FROM BMS_ROUT_GRP_VHC_CMPSTN A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST B ON A.ROUT_GRP = B.ROUT_GRP LEFT JOIN BMS_VHC_MST C ON A.VHC_ID = C.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST D ON C.COMP_ID = D.COMP_ID
AND A.ROUT_GRP LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || B.ROUT_GRP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND A.ROUT_GRP LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND B.ROUT_GRP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
SELECT a.ROUT_GRP ,b.ROUT_GRP_NM FROM BMS_DAY_ALLOC_PL_INFO a LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST b ON a.ROUT_GRP = b.ROUT_GRP

select DATE_FORMAT(a.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') OCR_DTM ,a.ROUT_GRP ,a.ROUT_GRP_NM ,a.NODE_ID ,a.VHC_ID ,a.ROUT_NM ,a.VIOLT_TYPE ,a.GPS_X ,a.GPS_Y ,a.JUDGE ,a.JUDG_ORG ,a.JUDG_TYPE ,a.JUDG_DESC ,a.ROUT_ID ,a.VHC_ID ,a.VHC_NO ,b.NODE_NM from BMS_OPER_VIOLT_HIS a LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST b ON a.NODE_ID = b.NODE_ID
AND (a.ROUT_GRP LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || a.ROUT_GRP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%'))
AND a.ROUT_GRP LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND a.ROUT_GRP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{F_DATE}
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{L_DATE}
AND (DATE_FORMAT(a.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{F_DATE} AND #{L_DATE})
ORDER BY a.OCR_DTM DESC

SELECT NODE_ID, NODE_NM FROM BMS_NODE_MST
AND NODE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND NODE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY NODE_ID
